resources.string: Standard license level has been set successfully.
Failed to set Standard license level.

Failed to set the client id. You need to provide a valid client id.

 1. Go to https://developers.arcgis.com.
 2. Sign in with your ArcGIS developer account.
 3. Create an application. This will give you access to a client id string.
 4. Pass the client id string to ArcGISRuntime.setClientId().
